text: Romeo Hanover (1963-1988) was a Standardbred racehorse won became the third horse to ever win the Triple Crown of Harness Racing for Pacers.http://www.standardbredcanada.ca/news/4-4-14/silverman-retires- training.html Trained by Jerry Silverman, during his career Romeo Hanover was driven by William Myer, George Sholty, Stanley Dancer and Del Miller. In 2005 he was inducted into the United States Harness Racing Hall of Fame Harness Racing Museum and Hall of Fame bio for Romeo Hanover ==References== Category:American Standardbred racehorses Category:Cane Pace winners Category:Little Brown Jug winners Category:Messenger Stakes winners Category:United States Harness Racing Hall of Fame inductees Category:Harness racing in the United States Category:Triple Crown of Harness Racing winners
title: Romeo Hanover
